TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChildChangedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for the and events.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ChildChangedEventArgs> class is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> classes when the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties change.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ChildChangedEventArgs.PreviousChild%2A> property to get the previously assigned child control or element.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object previousChild) cil managed

Docs.param: The value of the property before the new value was assigned.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets the value of the property before the new value was assigned.
Docs.value: The value of the property before the new value was assigned.
